name: Fixies Tamagochi - Kids Games, Puzzles & Cartoons
name_original: Fixies Tamagochi - Kids Games, Puzzles & Cartoons
description:
Fixies Tamagotchi is your virtual companion. In this funny game you will care for your favorite Fixies. Play the new Fiksiki - Kids Games, Puzzles, Match three (three in row) and watch all series of the cartoon!

Nolik, Simka, Fire, Verda, Toola and Digit is awaiting you in all-new game for kids from 3 years old. Choose your favorite character and unveil the entire world of Fixies full of funny games with all cartoon series!

This game appeals to children of all age: fancy graphics, various gameplay and simple control - all these are welcome you in it. If you like Masha and the Bear cartoon and games, you fall in love with Fixies, so you fix all the things around.

ALL FIXIES
Who you like most? Beautiful Verda or uncatchable Fire? Unlock all characters to play your favourite one!

6 MINI-GAMES
Free kids games: here you can play match three (three in row), find a pair, jigsaw puzzles and ride a flyboard!

CARE FOR FIXIES
The most important thing for Fixies is obviously fixes! And of course after fixing something they will need you to care for them. Your companions need to be washed and dried-up, and then they’ll need your help to clean-up the room!

ALL CARTOON SERIES
Unlock cartoon series together with Fixies in the game, so watch videos in a single app! This is the best activity for you when Fixies goes for fixing. If you like cartoon Masha and the Bear, you definitely like the Fixies!
